New Records: Tilak Varma hit a four in the fourth over of the match
Shubman Gill opened the innings for India
Ishan Kishan scored a six in the first over
Kyle Mayers took a brilliant catch to dismiss Suryakumar Yadav
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bat first
West Indies had a strong fielding performance
Rovman Powell mentioned the team's growth and focus
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies won the match by 2 wickets
India's performance was criticized by some fans and analysts
The match was significant for both teams in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Providence Stadium, Guyana
The series was part of the 5 T20I matches
